body:
It's been somewhere between 2 and 3 days and while my profile is there the statistics don't show up.
Is it natural to take this long?
body_tagged:

title: Profile statistics don't load

replies.body: Strange issue because I can access the stats directly, but not through the dynamic call. I'll look into it.
